resources.string: Itâ€™s gonna always get better if you never give up
What does not kill you, only makes you stronger.
If you arent willing to look foolish as a beginner , youll never become a graceful master, embarrassment is the cost of entry
You will be as happy as you make up your mind to be..
Believe in progress not in perfection
A ship in a harbour is safe but thats not what a ship is built for.
You might be the sweetest of apples , but some people just dont like apples
The axe might forget but the tree never does.
Sometimes winning is not about reaching a goal, its about being the last one standing
You cannot choose what happens, but you can choose how you respond
